email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah Connor,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with our initial freight quote for the transportation of 25,000MT of Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m.

Our starting quote stands at USD 18.50 per metric ton. The laycan period is from October 20 to October 25, ensuring a timely delivery.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the current market rates, could there be a possibility to review the rate? We are looking for a more competitive offer to align with our budget constraints.

Could you please consider this and provide a revised quote? Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your feedback. After considering the current market conditions, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 17.75 per MT. This adjustment reflects our commitment to providing competitive rates while maintaining high service standards.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Alex Turner

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hello Alex,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 17.75 per MT. I would like to request further details on the demurrage terms and the vessel's loading rate to ensure there won't be issues during the loading process at Port Hedland.

Also, could you confirm the laycan period remains as previously stated? A precise schedule is crucial for our operations.

Thank you,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the loading rate of MV OCEAN STAR is 10,000MT per day, which should align well with your operational requirements. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there's a delay beyond the agreed laydays, which remains as October 20-25.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Alex Turner

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Iron Ore Shipment Agreement: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
